What is the outlook for Lambert-Eaton Myasthenic Syndrome ?,The prognosis for individuals with LEMS varies. Those with LEMS not associated with malignancy have a benign overall prognosis. Generally the presence of cancer determines the prognosis.,NINDS,Lambert-Eaton
